summary: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.
cast: Song Kang-Ho|Byun Hee-Bong|Hae-il Park|Bae Doona|Asung Ko|Dal-su Oh|Jae-eung Lee|Dong-ho Lee|Je-mun Yun|David Anselmo|Do-bin Baek|Martin Lord Cayce|Cristen Cho|Dae-Sung Choi|Doo-Yeong Choi|Jae-Sup Choi|Su-hee Go|Seo-Yoon Gong|Philip Hersh|Hyeong-Ho Jeong|In-gi Jeong|Ha-Geon Ji|Kang-hee Jung|Bi-bi Kim|Choo-wol Kim|Da-Yeon Kim|Hak-seon Kim|Hyo-Sun Kim|Jin-Sun Kim|Nan-Hee Kim|Roe-ha Kim|Sang-Jo Kim|Bang-hyeon Kwon|Byung-gil Kwon|Hyeok-poong Kwon|Paul Lazar|Brian Lee|Dong-yong Lee|Eung-Jae Lee|Hoon-Jin Lee|Jong-Yoon Lee|Seung-jin Lee|Kyung Jin Min|Hee-Ra Moon|Clinton Morgan|Jeong-gi Park|Jin-woo Park|Kyeong-Mok Park|No-shik Park|Mi-ran Ra|Brian Rhee|Ha-Neul Seo|Seung-Ri Shin|Hyeon-jong Sin|Young-Soon Son|Jin-ho Song|Kyeong-Ha Song|Scott Wilson|Pil-sung Yim|Seung-mok Yoo|Je-Moon Yoon|Yeon-su Yu
title: The Host
